subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Liverpool’s captain, Steven Gerrard, returned to training and received the full support of Manager Rafa Benítez, who spoke to him about his assault charges after a bar brawl. Gerrard, a midfielder, is to appear in court in three weeks and faces a potential five-year prison sentence.
